items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready, universal library for transforming callback-style functions into Promise-based ones. Works seamlessly across Node.js, Deno, and browsers.

items.content_html: This is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to change the background color of the page dynamically. The project is built using ReactJs, making it lightweight and easy to use. It serves as a great example of how JavaScript can manipulate the DOM to create engaging and responsive web applications.
items.title: GauravSingh696/Color-Changer: This is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to change the background color of the page dynamically. The project is built using ReactJs, making it lightweight and easy to use. It serves as a great example of how JavaScript can manipulate the DOM to create engaging and responsive web applications.
